## Multiple Linear Regression

```{r install-packages}
install.packages("moments")
library(moments)
```
Constructing Performance Evaluation Function for Regression:
```{r perf-eval-func}
perf_eval_reg <- function(tgt_y, pred_y){
  # RMSE
  rmse <- sqrt(mean((tgt_y - pred_y)^2))
  # MAE
  mae <- mean(abs((tgt_y - pred_y)/tgt_y))
  # MAPE
  mape <- 100*mean(abs((tgt_y - pred_y)/tgt_y))
  
  return(c(rmse, mae, mape))
}
```
